entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-16
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: string.ConstantEmpty #60508
  • Optimization opportunity for non-embeddable constants access in compiled Linq.Expressions #60506

Closed

  • [JIT]: Codegen for manual devirtualization #60492
  • `DateTime.Now` on Linux has wrong timezone #60469
    7.0.0
  • library_mono.js triggers apparent false-positive report from GitHub's codeql scan #59147
    6.0.0
  • API Named SetupDiEnumDeviceInterfaces Of setupapi.dll Error At .net core platform #59787
  • JsonCamelCaseNamingPolicy weird behavior #38437
    Future
  • Bug about JsonNode.Deserialize with unicode #60470

PullRequests

Created

  • Code optimization (and possibly coverage optimization) for System.Text.Json #60509
    area-System.Text.Json
  • SetCreationTime, SetLastAccessTime, SetLastWriteTime Should not open a new stream to obtain a SafeFileHandle #60507
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Properly type primary selectors in `fgMemoryVNForLoopSideEffects` #60505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [wasm] encapsulate emscripten js runtime #60504
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0

Merged

  • Reflection Invoke share more coreclr/mono #60270
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix for Ctor_Brush_Width test on Non-English Windows #60502
    area-System.Drawing, community-contribution
  • [wasm] string interpolation instead of concatenation #60490
    arch-wasm, 7.0.0
  • [hackathon] Implement CreateSpan<T> intrinsic. #60498
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/6.0] Update IntelliSense package #60488
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0] Fix Int32 overflow bug in buffering logic #60460
    Servicing-approved, area-System.IO
  • fix rid processing on macOS #60494
    area-Host
  • Fix WinMD handling in System.Reflection.MetadataLoadContext #58344
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [arm64] JIT: Don't emit OVERFLOW and DIVIDED-BY-ZERO for "X div CNS" #60493
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add documentation on how VN numbers memory #60476
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Allow interp->jit transitions for generic methods. #60461
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][llvmonly] Optimize virtual calls/rgctx fetches in gsharedvt methods. #60491
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [WASM] Adding a new switch to run wasm on NodeJS #54640
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Change Brotli Optimal CompressionLevel value #57440
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [Donot review ]Wasm tests #60482
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Experiment with Roslyn optimization for ROS<T> in assembly data section #60327
  • Merge feature/use-dllimport-generator to main #59579
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
